title: Fact Vs Fiction: Cop Dies During Bharat Bandh; Old Pics Go Viral
subtitle: Fact Vs Fiction: Fake News Of The Week.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
While sub-inspector Mahendra Choudhary passed away this week, three photos on social media of an old and unrelated incident go viral.

Watch episode - 25 of Fact Vs Fiction where Jency Jacob and Suyash Barve as they discuss how BOOM debunked these forwards.

In this video we cover the following stories:

Old Photos Being Shared As Photos Of Cop Who Died During Bharat Bandh Protests
